snippet: The Knicks had a hard time explaining their brutal loss to the Boston Celtics, a team that is in full rebuilding mode and has a rookie coach.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column contends that the New York Knicks have a hard time explaining their brutal loss to the Boston Celtics, a team that is in full rebuilding mode and has a rookie coach.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks had a hard time explaining their brutal loss to the Boston Celtics, a team that is in full rebuilding mode and has a rookie coach.

headline.main: A Rebuilding Meets a Falling Apart
headline.print_headline: A Rebuilding Meets A Falling Apart
